Required_Data: Agility + Instinct + Threat Level + Powers + Equipment + Situation
Formula: Initiative = AGI + (INT/2) + Threat_Bonus + Power_Bonus + Equipment_Bonus + Situation_Mod

Error_Handling: Default to Agility if other stats missing

Required_Data: Available actions based on character capabilities and situation
Formula: Character declares intended action from available options
Output_Data: Action chosen with AP cost and target selection
Special_Cases: Some powers require line of sight or touch; environmental restrictions apply
Error_Handling: Default to basic attack if invalid action chosen

Required_Data: Skill + Power + Equipment + Environmental + Target Defense

Output_Data: Hit/Miss result with degree of success
Integration_Points: Dodge charts + skill bonuses + power modifiers
Special_Cases: Column Shift system determines White/Green/Yellow/Red results
Error_Handling: Minimum 5% hit chance; maximum 95% hit chance

Required_Data: Weapon + Power + Strength + Accuracy Result

Error_Handling: Minimum 1 damage on successful hit

Required_Data: Armor type vs damage type + armor condition

Error_Handling: No armor = no reduction

Required_Data: Raw damage - armor reduction + environmental factors
Special_Cases: Environmental bonuses from height advantage or environmental hazards
Error_Handling: Minimum 0 damage (cannot heal through armor)

Required_Data: Damage type + attack result + power effects + environmental factors
Formula: Status effects applied based on damage source and circumstances
Special_Cases: Fire damage causes burning; psychic attacks may cause mental effects; critical hits cause bleeding
Error_Handling: Status effects stack according to severity rules

Required_Data: Attacker strength + attack result + target resistance + environmental factors
Formula: Knockback_Distance = Attacker_STR_Rank (if Major Success or higher)

Error_Handling: No knockback on White or Green results unless special power

Required_Data: Knockback result + environmental materials + impact force

Error_Handling: Environmental damage affects future combat rounds in same location

Required_Data: Environmental damage + civilian presence + visibility + faction relations

Required_Data: Final damage + existing status effects + healing factors

Required_Data: Equipment damage from combat + environmental exposure + power interactions
Special_Cases: Energy attacks damage electronic equipment; physical impacts damage armor; power overloads may destroy equipment
Error_Handling: Equipment destroyed at 0% condition

Required_Data: Combat difficulty + actions used + victory achievement + civilian protection

Required_Data: Combat outcome + property damage + civilian impact + media coverage + faction relations

Required_Data: Combat location + enemy defeated + evidence gathered + witness testimony

Output_Data: Complete combat results with all consequences
Special_Cases: Standard combat between characters using established rules
Error_Handling: Full consequence processing

Output_Data: Multiple targets affected with distance-based effects

Required_Data: Ongoing effects that continue until dispelled or duration expires
Output_Data: Ongoing power effects tracked across multiple rounds
Special_Cases: Flight continues until stopped; invisibility lasts until broken; force fields persist until destroyed
Error_Handling: Sustained powers require concentration; may end if character stunned

Calculation_Method: Powers that respond to other actions
Required_Data: Triggered abilities that activate in response to specific events
Output_Data: Reactive power activation when conditions met
Integration_Points: Reaction timing integration + trigger condition tracking
Special_Cases: Enhanced reflexes respond to attacks; precognition reacts to danger; force fields activate when attacked
Error_Handling: Reaction powers interrupt normal initiative order

Required_Data: Buildings and structures damaged by combat

Error_Handling: Destroyed environment affects movement and cover options

Required_Data: Fire spread; electrical damage; chemical leaks; radiation

Error_Handling: Environmental hazards persist and may worsen over time

Calculation_Method: Weather and atmospheric conditions affecting combat

Output_Data: Combat modifier adjustments based on weather
Integration_Points: Weather integration with power and equipment effectiveness
Special_Cases: Strong winds affect flight and projectiles; rain reduces fire effectiveness; fog reduces visibility
Error_Handling: Weather effects apply throughout combat duration

Required_Data: One side completely defeated with minimal damage to victor
Formula: Victor suffers less than 25% health loss; loser reduced to unconscious or surrender
Output_Data: Clear winner with tactical superiority demonstrated
Special_Cases: Victor demonstrates superior tactics or power; loser clearly outmatched
Error_Handling: High reputation gain; minimal legal consequences

Required_Data: Technical victory but with significant losses or damage
Formula: Victor suffers 50%+ health loss or major equipment damage; achieved objective
Special_Cases: Victor wins but at great cost; questions effectiveness of approach
Error_Handling: Reputation loss; significant legal and financial consequences

Required_Data: No clear victor; both sides suffer major losses
Formula: Both sides reduced to unconscious or critical condition
Special_Cases: Both sides fought to mutual destruction; external factors determine final outcome
Error_Handling: Legal consequences for both; no clear resolution

Required_Data: Strategic withdrawal or successful escape
Formula: Escaping side reaches safety; pursuing side fails to prevent escape
Special_Cases: Successful strategic thinking; live to fight another day
Error_Handling: Minimal legal consequences; tactical intelligence gained

Calculation_Method: Mission objective achieved regardless of battle result

Formula: Objective completed even if combat was lost or drawn
Special_Cases: Strategic thinking overcomes tactical disadvantage; mission first mentality
Error_Handling: Reduced legal consequences due to mission success
